sentences: Klassikaline muusikat kuulda alati r천천mu annab.
context: Muusika is the Estonian word for 'music'. It refers to the art form whose artistic elements are created with sounds and perceived as sounds. The word can refer to music as an art form, musical works/compositions, or in everyday language specifically to instrumental music. In broader usage, it can also describe anything that resembles music or has a musical effect - such as 'the music of the waves' (lainete kohin on mere muusika).
